original_title: Good Grief: A Comedy About Loss and Being Bad at It
overview: When comedian Glen Tickle's younger brother died unexpectedly in a car accident, he dealt with it the way he deals with everything, jokes. Good Grief is an hour of stand-up comedy that deals with the difficult topics of grief, death, and the dumb things people say at funerals.
title: Good Grief: A Comedy About Loss and Being Bad at It
